comment: Mixed experience at Raqmiya. The office chair works but several advertised features aren't as useful as described.

Premium quality at competitive prices! My laptop cooling pad feels like luxury without the luxury price tag.

graphics tablet caused electrical issues in my setup. They refuse to acknowledge the problem.
